data.title: Rend Collective Releases “CHOOSE TO WORSHIP” Album
data.meta_description: Rend Collective’s seventh studio project, CHOOSE TO WORSHIP, is available now! data.text:
Rend Collective’s seventh studio project, CHOOSE TO WORSHIP, is available now! Largely written over the course of their average of 120 tour dates a year, CHOOSE TO WORSHIP features 13 tracks that range in sound and meaning. The album all returns to a greater message that’s explained through the album artwork, “We used a labyrinth as our album art concept to reflect the confusing, messiness of life. So many twists and turns, so many little micro decisions, so much uncertainty and doubt, so much fear. In the middle of all this it can be so easy to forget to make the one choice that ultimately makes all the others insignificant : to love God with all our heart, soul, mind and strength.”

CHOOSE TO WORSHIP Album Track Listing:

I CHOOSE TO WORSHIP

REVIVAL ANTHEM

DAY OF VICTORY

SING IT FROM THE SHACKLES

MY ADVOCATE

STILL

UNCONDITIONAL

BEHOLD HE COMES

DEFIANT

YOUR NAME IS POWER

REND THE HEAVENS

WHOLEHEARTED

YOUR NAME IS POWER – Acoustic

Listen to CHOOSE TO WORSHIP by Rend Collective here now!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BG11iiDKY8Y
